text: Jon Courtenay (born 1973) is a British pianist, singer and comedian, known for winning the fourteenth series of Britain's Got Talent, having previously been awarded the golden buzzer during his audition by presenters Ant & Dec. He is from Mossley in Greater Manchester and has also lived in Suffolk. == References == == External links == * Official site * Article in Evening Chronicle * Article in Ipswich Star Category:English entertainers Category:British male comedians Category:British male pianists Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Britain's Got Talent contestants Category:Got Talent winners
title: Jon Courtenay
